dataset.select: SELECT id, class, active, COALESCE (description, '') AS description FROM boat_class ORDER BY class
dataset.update: UPDATE boat_class SET class = TRIM ({{class}}), active = {{active}}, description = NULLIF (TRIM ({{description}}), ''), change_user = {{__username}}, change_date = datetime ('now') WHERE id = {{id}};
dataset.insert: INSERT INTO boat_class (class, active, description, change_user, change_date) VALUES (TRIM ({{class}}), {{active}}, NULLIF (TRIM ({{description}}), ''), {{__username}}, datetime ('now'));
